alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 19 at 6:28PM CDT until May 19 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Excelsior, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations in or near the path include... Greenwood... Huntington... Midland... Washburn... Excelsior... Burnville... Jenny Lind... Arkola... Crossroads... Liberty... Witcherville... Dayton... Milltown... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
